label: Quarter-to-date
summary_md:
# PTD Today Quarter-to-date Intelligence Brief

## 1) Top themes
- Offshore wind power capacity and technology advancements
- Global leadership in renewable energy manufacturing and deployment
- Scale and performance of offshore wind turbines

## 2) Top stories
- China maintains its lead in the single-unit capacity of offshore wind turbines in 2025, with Vestas installing its 15 MW turbine at offshore wind farms. (Source: offshorewind.biz)

## 3) Sector takeaways  
**Renewables**  
- Offshore wind continues to scale up with leading manufacturers pushing turbine capacities to 15 MW and beyond, emphasizing Chinaâ€™s dominant role in capacity leadership.  

## 4) Notable companies/regions mentioned  
- China (regional leader in offshore wind turbine capacity)  
- Vestas (installed 15 MW offshore wind turbine)
